QuestData.Title: The Warlord's Guard
QuestData.Description: I don't know what you are accustomed to, traveler, but these lands devour the weak. Perhaps Durotan wishes to rid himself of you. We shall see.$b$bYou must kill the Warlord of the Circle of Blood. Do this and the ogres here will be defeated. But first, you must find him.$b$bI have located his bodyguards nearby. Slay them and bring me their heads. With them, we shall lure the Warlord into the open.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather the Head of Thunk, the Head of Gullok, and the Head of Splorg.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well in this, but do not become proud. This land has dangers far greater than what you have seen here.
